author: Narendra Kumandan
text:
It will be a surprise if @alluarjun does not leave you amazed for his transformation for a role.NPS is a complete AA show. His attitude & screen presence are 🔥His scar,cigar swag, toned body elevate the character & get required essence to the role

Flop but glory

author: Narendra Kumandan
text:
I have participated in a lot of dance competitions but never won a prize so far. Later,I realized that winning a dance competition requires not just dancing skills but also a unique presentation of that particular dance form

-Allu Arjun

author: Narendra Kumandan
text:
I am not a gifted talent. As a kid, I did not have any special skill. Nothing comes naturally to me. I have to struggle a lot to do something. 

- Allu Arjun

@alluarjun 

#HappyBirthdayAlluArjun

author: Narendra Kumandan
text:
When Gangothri released, little did we know that he is going to become a star,he's now. He graduated from a school of hard knocks & went through an exhaustive process of learning from each failure.

Wishing @alluarjun  many more happy returns of the day

#HappyBirthdayAlluArjun https://t.co/cZxVPIuUKC

text:

text:

A sociopath, in quest for both friendship and love muddles his life but universe conspires to make both happen owing to his purity of emotions. 
"A glory of a flop"

More strength to them. Keep rising above hatred.

author: Narendra Kumandan
text: This has been so disturbing. Respect towards a human is first thing one should learn, and then step into a responsible profession and do their duty.

author: Narendra Kumandan
text: Instead of being public servants, some traffic police officers are behaving like  public masters. In case of offense,they are only supposed to perform their duty but not speak in a derogatory manner and offend public.Kindly look into this and urge you to mend their behavior

author: Narendra Kumandan
text: Said this 100 times & will say it again.People talk mostly about your crime dramas & horror thrillers highly but when it comes to Dark Comedy,no one in TFI (or perhaps in IFI)can even come close to you.Hope you do more movies in the genre. Its a delight to watch them. @RGVzoomin https://t.co/JsADBbwWgC
